title: json_encoder not invoked from flask.jsonify
raw_output: Issue 1443 reports that a custom JSON encoder class extended from flask.json.JSONEncoder is not called when using flask.jsonify. The fix involves modifying flask/json.py to properly use the app's json_encoder when serializing. Predicted files: (1) flask/json.py - the core file containing JSONEncoder and jsonify that needs the fix. (2) CHANGES - changelog entry for the bug fix. (3) tests/test_helpers.py - JSON encoding tests live in the helpers test file (json.py functionality is tested there). Exploration: Matched flask/json.py -> tests/test_helpers.py for test coverage, added CHANGES for changelog entry as is standard for Flask bug fixes.
